Elevate, Engage, Excel  
The Esports Ecosystem of East Africa.

BARBAH Games is committed to transforming the esports landscape in East Africa. We aim to break down societal barriers that have traditionally stigmatized esports, spotlighting the multifaceted opportunities within the industry. Our mission is to serve as a conduit for talent, education, and community in the East African esports ecosystem.

![macbook](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmacbook.57390a6e.png&w=2048&q=75)

Subscribe to our newsletter
---------------------------

### Get the latest updates on our Barbah Games

Select GenderMaleFemale

Select Country

Select Gamer TypeNew GamerCasual GamerIntermediate GamerPro GamerAdvance Gamer

Sign Up to our Newsletter

Features
--------

![Book](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbook.35fce3be.png&w=256&q=75)

### Avatar Creation

Embark on your esports journey with a one-of-a-kind avatar, customizable and interoperable across a wide range of games. In partnership with Ready Player Me, we make your first step in the esports world a memorable one

![Airplane](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fairplane.c8347a5d.png&w=256&q=75)

### Meta mask wallet

Financial security is pivotal in the esports world. We guide you through the process of setting up a Meta Mask Wallet, ensuring your digital assets and earnings are secure.

![People](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpeople.3218128c.png&w=256&q=75)

### Travel Facilitation

Navigating esports events has never been easier. From booking flights to hotel reservations, our platform serves as your digital travel concierge

![People](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpeople.3218128c.png&w=256&q=75)

### Educational Resources

Step up your game with our in-depth tutorials, guides, and educational partnerships. Whether you're a newbie or a seasoned gamer, our resources help you reach the next level.

LearningElevate your performance with our comprehensive tutorials, guides, and educational partnerships. Whether you're a newcomer or a seasoned gamer, our resources aim to propel you to the next level by furnishing you with crucial insights into Web3 literacy, the avatar economy, and intelligent in-game purchase strategies. Delve into the domain of esports entrepreneurship and discover a variety of career pathways, with a spotlight on opportunities in Atlanta and globally. Our resources are crafted to aid both gaming enthusiasts and aspiring esports professionals in advancing their understanding and capabilities. Through a fusion of practical knowledge and industry insights, embark on a learning expedition that goes beyond the gaming arena, unlocking a realm of possibilities within the esports ecosystem.

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature1.1b842992.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature2.639a9dba.png&w=3840&q=75)

VisaNavigating esports events has never been easier. From booking flights to hotel reservations, our platform serves as your digital travel concierge. Through our AI booking system, BARBAH GAMES offers real-time, personalized travel solutions, ensuring a seamless booking experience so you can concentrate solely on the awaiting esports competition. Beyond the competition, our platform invites exploration of the local cultures at your destinations, adding depth to your esports journey. With BARBAH GAMES, you're not just attending an event; you're stepping into a comprehensive esports expedition, blending competitive excitement with the allure of local exploration. Your adventure, streamlined and enriched, awaits with just a click.

CommunityBecome part of a vibrant community where you can connect, learn, and grow. BARBAH Games brings together e-athletes, gaming enthusiasts, and esports professionals under one platform. Subscription Model: For just $X/month , unlock premium features like exclusive events, tournaments, and educational tutorials, curated and created by our expert community members.

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature3.40c0d5cd.png&w=3840&q=75)

### Simple, transparent pricing

No contracts. No surprise fees.

*   Monthly
*   Yearly

### Free/month

#### Intro

would include avatar creation, access to some basic KPIs, Initial Esports Career consultation.

*   All limited links
*   Own analytics platform
*   Chat support
*   Optimize hashtags
*   Unlimited users

Choose Plan

### $20/month

#### Base

all the service of free, plus more comprehensive KPIs, Career consultation, access to sponsors, Social media Consultation.

*   All limited links
*   Own analytics platform
*   Chat support
*   Optimize hashtags
*   Unlimited users

Choose Plan

MOST POPULAR

### $99/month

#### Pro

all other services included, plus group KPI for up to 5 gamers, indepth career consultation

*   All limited links
*   Own analytics platform
*   Chat support
*   Optimize hashtags
*   Unlimited users

Choose Plan

For most businesses that want to optimize web queries

Choose Plan

Choose Plan

Testimonials
------------

Hear from our community members, partners, and e-athletes who have leveraged BARBAH Games to elevate their esports journey.

_"BARBAH Games transformed the way I engage with esports. From the importance avatar creation and financial literacy to community engagement, every step has been rewarding."_ — Zee, Professional E-Athlete

Follow Us
---------

### on our social media

Ready to level up your gaming experience? Join us on our "Barbah Games" social media pages and become part of our vibrant gaming community! Get the latest updates on exciting game releases, exclusive content, and connect with fellow gamers who share your passion. Don't miss out on the fun – follow us today and let's embark on epic gaming adventures together! #BarbahGames #GamingCommunity #LevelUp

Elevate, Engage, Excel  
Join the Esports Adventure in East Africa!

BARBAH Games is committed to transforming the esports landscape in East Africa. We aim to break down societal barriers that have traditionally stigmatized esports, spotlighting the multifaceted opportunities within the industry. Our mission is to serve as a conduit for talent, education, and community in the East African esports ecosystem.

Features
--------

![Book](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbook.35fce3be.png&w=256&q=75)

### Inclusivity

Creating a space where everyone, regardless of background, can participate in esports.

![Airplane](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fairplane.c8347a5d.png&w=256&q=75)

### Integrity

Upholding the highest standards of ethics and fairness in all our interactions.

![People](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpeople.3218128c.png&w=256&q=75)

### Innovation

Continuously advancing our services and platforms to stay ahead in the rapidly evolving esports industry.

![People](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fairplane.c8347a5d.png&w=256&q=75)

### Community Focus

Building strong, supportive communities that elevate individual and collective esports talent.

Where We StartedOur story began in Atlanta, Georgia, a place known for its love of esports, and now we’re bringing that excitement to East Africa. Our founder loves gaming and believes itcan be more than just fun. It can be a way for young people to build careers and achieve great things.

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature1.1b842992.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature2.639a9dba.png&w=3840&q=75)

What We DoAt BARBAH GAMES, we’re not just about playing games. We help gamerscreate cool avatars with Ready Player Me, keep their game earnings safe with MetaMask Wallet,and even make it easier for them to travel to esports events around the world.

VisionOur vision is to be the cornerstone for esports in East Africa, enriching lives and communities through competitive gaming, educational empowerment, and industry exposure. We seek to create a nurturing platform that molds amateur gamers into professional e-athletes while also creating avenues for other career paths within esports.

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature3.40c0d5cd.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature1.1b842992.png&w=3840&q=75)

Learning and GrowingWe think gaming can be a path to learning and growing. That’s whywe’re connecting gamers with schools and colleges that can help them build a future in the esports world.

Our CommunityWe’re building a big family of gamers, fans, and esports pros to learn, share,and grow together. With a small monthly fee, members get special access to private game events,learning sessions, and global tournaments.

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature2.639a9dba.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Feature Image](https://www.barbahgames.gg/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeature3.40c0d5cd.png&w=3840&q=75)

Our DreamOur big dream is to make Kenya the go-to place for esports in East Africa. Wewant to create a place where gamers can come together, learn, and compete on a global stage.

Follow Us
---------

### on our social media

Ready to level up your gaming experience? Join us on our "Barbah Games" social media pages and become part of our vibrant gaming community! Get the latest updates on exciting game releases, exclusive content, and connect with fellow gamers who share your passion. Don't miss out on the fun – follow us today and let's embark on epic gaming adventures together! #BarbahGames #GamingCommunity #LevelUp

Privacy Policy  
BARBAH games and VR.

This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You respond to our advertisements and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. We use Your Personal Data to contact and support you, as well as to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

Interpretation and Definitions
------------------------------

### Interpretation

The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

### Definitions

For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

*   **Company** (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to BARBAH games and Vr.
*   **Device** means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
*   **Personal Data** is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
*   **Service** refers to the advertisement, website, or application.
*   **Service Provider** means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.
*   **Usage Data** refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
*   **You** means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
---------------------------------------

### Types of Data Collected

#### Personal Data

While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

*   First name and last name
*   Email address
*   Phone number
*   Location details such as your address, city, or country
*   Any other data such as personal preferences, requirements, or comments

#### Use of Your Personal Data

The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:

*   To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service.
*   To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.
*   For the performance of a contract: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.
*   To contact You: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.
*   To provide You with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.
*   To manage Your requests: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.
*   For business transfers: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Data held by Us about our Service users is among the assets transferred.
*   For other purposes: We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.

We may share Your personal information in the following situations:

*   With Service Providers: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.
*   For business transfers: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.
*   With Affiliates: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.
*   With business partners: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.
*   With other users: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.
*   With Your consent: We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.

Retention of Your Personal Data
-------------------------------

The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.

The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes.

Transfer of Your Personal Data
------------------------------

Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.

Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.

The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.

This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You respond to our advertisements and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

Interpretation and Definitions
------------------------------

### Interpretation

The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

### Definitions

For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

*   **Company** (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to BARBAH games and Vr.
*   **Device** means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
*   **Personal Data** is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
*   **Service** refers to the advertisement, website, or application.
*   **Service Provider** means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.
*   **Usage Data** refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
*   **You** means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
---------------------------------------

### Types of Data Collected

#### Personal Data

While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

*   First name and last name
*   Email address
*   Phone number
*   Location details such as your address, city, or country
*   Any other data such as personal preferences, requirements, or comments

#### Use of Your Personal Data

*   To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service.
*   To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.
*   For the performance of a contract: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.
*   To contact You: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.
*   To provide You with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.
*   To manage Your requests: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.
*   For business transfers: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Data held by Us about our Service users is among the assets transferred.
*   For other purposes: We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.

We may share Your personal information in the following situations:

*   With Service Providers: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.
*   For business transfers: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.
*   With Affiliates: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.
*   With business partners: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.
*   With other users: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.
*   With Your consent: We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.

Retention of Your Personal Data
-------------------------------

The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.

The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes.

Transfer of Your Personal Data
------------------------------

Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.

Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.

Cookie Policy

Last updated on 2023-11-03

This website uses cookies to store your login data so that you do not need to log in again the next time you visit our website. This helps to improve your user experience and makes it easier for you to use our website.

We also use cookies to track and analyze traffic to our website. This helps us to understand how users interact with our website and to identify areas where we can improve.

You can opt out of having cookies stored on your computer by disabling cookies in your browser settings. However, please note that disabling cookies may prevent you from using some of the features or functionality on our website.

For more information about cookies and how to disable them, please visit the website of the Information Commissioner's Office (ICO): [https://ico.org.uk/](https://ico.org.uk/)

How we use cookies to store login data
--------------------------------------

When you log in to our website, we store a cookie on your computer that contains your login information. This cookie is used to automatically log you in to our website the next time you visit.

The login cookie expires after a certain period of time, typically 30 days. If you do not log in to our website within this period of time, the cookie will be deleted and you will need to log in again.

How to opt out of having your login data stored
-----------------------------------------------

You can opt out of having your login data stored by disabling cookies in your browser settings. To do this, please consult the help section of your browser.

Please note that disabling cookies may prevent you from using some of the features or functionality on our website.
